name: [ASH] the Seeds of Destruction
description:
2130 CE

After a biological disaster in the town of Tomishogo turns the inhabitants into superpowered maniacs, World Police Agent John Oswald is trapped within a military quarantine. Armed with powers of his own—the ability to manipulate solid matter—he must fight for his life, and the safety of a mysterious young girl, and find a way to escape the nightmarish town.

Scenario - Anairis Quinones
Art, Character Designs, Original Idea - Enrique Carmena
Producer, Editor - Shoji Amasawa
Programmer, QA - Reika Aoyama
OST - Greyberry
Sound Effects - Seiji Amasawa
ED 'Third World War' - Sayuri Maebara
